Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Requires that the identity of all direct and indirect owners of the membership interests in a limited liability company be included in the articles of organization and in state contracts
Summary: Requires that the identity of all direct and indirect owners of the membership interests in a limited liability company be included in the articles of organization and in state contracts.
LawCode: Amd ยง203, Lim Lil L; add ยง139-m, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the limited liability company law and the state finance law, in relation to requiring the inclusion of the identity of all direct and indirect owners of the membership interests in a limited liability company in the articles of organization and in state contracts
